name: Volvo Trucks North America, Inc. v. Reeder-Simco GMC, Inc.
court: Supreme Court of the United States
reasoningForIncluding: The case involved a dispute between Volvo Trucks North America, Inc. and Reeder-Simco GMC, Inc. over differential pricing and competitive bidding.
